name: places/ChIJC0LMwtBZwokR2JEV2xDti3o
adrFormatAddress: 1586 1st Ave., New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: I was in desperate need of a cut and haven't found d a salon I like in the UES yet. They had an evening appointment, so I snatched it up! Paul totally understood what I wanted and cut my hair perfectly! I've had so many compliments.  One of the best cuts I've had in NYC!

text.text: I was in desperate need of a cut and haven't found d a salon I like in the UES yet. They had an evening appointment, so I snatched it up! Paul totally understood what I wanted and cut my hair perfectly! I've had so many compliments.  One of the best cuts I've had in NYC!

originalText.text: I have been seeing Paul for balayage, toner and cuts for two years. I have referred him to everyone I know and they are also very happy with their hair. I love how my hair comes out every time. Here are some photos of my balayage and cut from today. It always grows in so natural looking. I have never had faster service. I am usually in and out in under 2 hours. He’s the best! Gladis is also awesome. She put me to sleep today while washing my hair. I loved it!

originalText.text: Ardian is the best. He has done my hair now for the past few years and he is amazing with cuts and with blonde color. The salon is so nice and peaceful. I love it here.

text.text: Ardian is the best. He has done my hair now for the past few years and he is amazing with cuts and with blonde color. The salon is so nice and peaceful. I love it here.

originalText.text:
What an experience! I had gotten my hair colored once prior to coming here and the lady did a terrible job. She made my hair incredibly choppy/streaky and didn't match the color I wanted. My dad even compared it to a horse tail… and not a cute one

But then I purchased a groupon for a full balayage... and it was one of the best decisions I made in a while. After I sat down, I showed Paul a picture and described the cut I was aiming for. He was very professional and friendly and made sure I was okay with each step he took. The color came out a bit lighter than what I asked for but it’s fine because the outcome complimented my skin tone. My hair looks GORGEOUS I literally cannot believe that it’s my hair and not some picture off of google. He blended the color seamlessly and brought life back to my hair. You could never tell I walked in with a botched job!

If you’re using a Groupon, keep in mind that you have to pay for toner ($50), a $7 tax, and of course tip. After everything, the price is still very reasonable and very worth it. Also if you're going during times of social distancing, they may be booked out for a few weeks so plan ahead.

In all, I had a great experience and can’t wait to be back! I highly recommend A&G, definitely give them a shot :) And thank you so much Paul!

originalText.text:
This was the worst hair experience of my LIFE!! I spend $400 for my hair to be absolutley fried!! I came in for a balayage and Ardian ( who says hes the owner) sets me up with what had to be an absolute rookie at doing hair. Just look at the pictures!!! My scalp was burning so bad and the streaky patch job was a poor excuse for a balayage. I was crying and Ardian told me I can pay for him to fix it. So basically I pay $400 for your staff to fry my hair and put ridiculous stripes then you expect me to pay you AGAIN to fix it?! HE WAS SO RUDE!! HE LITERALLY TOLD ME TO MY FACE THAT THE GIRL IS NEW, BUT HE CANNOT FIX IT UNLESS I PAY AN ADDITIONAL 400! NASTY ATTITUDE AND KEPT MOVING CLOSER TOWARD ME AS HE WAS SPEAKING TO INTIMIDATE ME! NEEDLESS TO SAY, I HAD TO PAY $800 TO FIX THE DAMAGE FROM THIS SALON! HE IS ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING IN HIS BEHAVIOR AND TREATMENT TO ME.

In reply to the owners response: you are a compulsive liar. I paid CASH. How on earth could i have a groupon when groupons are redeemed before service? Im clearing sitting in your salin chair with my hair ruined by your staff who you say is no longer employed there ( i wonder why, maybe too many ppl experiencing what i did at the hands of your salon) furthermore i was the one in tears , but nice try to distort what acrually happened. Its okay, ppl can see through the B.s. abd decide for themselves. I went to a fantastic salon after this tragedy and they fixed my hair. As a business owner you should have some accountability and take reaponsibility instead of lying. just look at ALL the other ppl who rated 1 star that had their hair ruined by your salon!! GOODLUCK!!!
